text: 2.16: Mt 23.32-33; 24.6; Ru 11.52; FG 13.50Mbe nza Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ bun harigi fhaiŋ gumgi ga suanga tuav, mbe ana mpɨri. Mbe khueŋ nzuav, mbe Fhe Bakɨme taagip mba gumgi gu mbigi ndirganen, mbe suangane vuzvugi fhu. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgiap, zazera tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui. Mbe maaŋ mbuav simtɨgir warira phogi ga vuav, vov ntige mpuu bigeŋ ga muuŋgi. Mbe maaŋ mbuim, Fhe Bakɨmen ndav shirɨ ntigera mben ki.
